nodes.text: Kreshin was a Human female lieutenant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. A fair-skinned Human with brown eyes, Kreshin had her head shaved and a cranial implant installed. In 3637 BBY, she was part of the Imperial forces that worked to secure the captured Jedi Temple on the planet Tython after the Empire raided the world, and she sliced the deceased Jedi Master Liam Dentiri's training droids. However, she was slain defending the steps of the Temple from Republic forces.

Lieutenant Kreshin appears as the second boss of the Republic version of the Tactical Flashpoint "Assault on Tython," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7: Invasion. For Imperial players, the second boss in Master Liam Dentiri, and the two share many of their game mechanics.
